channel.title: Blog on idea.sharing
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on idea.sharing

item.title: Membership Inference Attack: Primer & Case Study
item.description: Machine learning models depend on large troves of data to develop and improve their inference / prediction capabilities. These models generalize their abilities, but inevitably some of their training data is encoded or memorized within their trained parameters. This post explores a method of quantifying model memorization, factors that make models more prone to memorization, and provides some mitigations against memorization.

item.title: AI in Art & Creativity
item.description: Why concerns about these new tools are echoes from previous generations and what they mean for the future of art and creativity.

item.title: Differential Privacy: Primer & Laplace Case Study
item.description: This post serves as a primer to Differential Privacy: presenting an intuitive foundation for the definition, proceeding to some math, and finally presenting a case study to demonstrate some key concepts.

item.title: How this all started...
item.description: In this inaugural post I walk through the decision making that informed the design of this site (which tools and technologies I used), and the steps to set it all up.
